name: Mad Panic Coaster
description: Mad Panic Coaster is a fast-paced roller coaster action game with a mix of punk/skating and horror/monster themes. While rushing along the roller coaster track at ludicrous speeds, try to avoid enemies, obstacles and falling off. There are five environments with three stages each, and a boss fight after every third stage. Survive three laps around the track to finish a stage. There is a health bar which depletes when you fall off the track or take hits; falling off with an empty health bar leads to a game over.
